name: Fire King Avatar Rangbali
effectText: If a face-up "Fire King" monster(s) you control is destroyed by card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated, while this card is on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy 1 other FIRE monster in your hand or face-up field. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Avatar Rangbali" once per turn.
